TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program 1.12: "On Final Approach" Grand Discussion Thread

Articles.Content: Make sure to verify your files in Steam, as I just updated from 1.11.2 to 1.12 and it found 49 files that failed to validate, so something is fishy.

4 minutes ago, MechBFP said:

Make sure to verify your files in Steam, as I just updated from 1.11.2 to 1.12 and it found 49 files that failed to validate, so something is fishy.

Did that fix the maneuver planner issues you were having before, or did it just stop the game from crashing?

7 minutes ago, 610yesnolovely said:

That's quite a bug! These past ten years we didn't actually need to build any rockets. 

That was a real thing for Gilly. I had been known to take advantage of it. Sometimes on purpose. And then sometimes by accident when being a little too impatient moving around on the surface. :-)

29 minutes ago, MechBFP said:

I also managed to crash the game by being in the Sun's orbit, with a maneuver node created to circularize at EVE, and then when into the Maneuver Planner and selected "MANEUVER 1" and then selected Moho and then it hung at calculating for awhile and then crashed. Can't remember if it crashed on its own or if I tried to re-select Moho because it was stuck at calculating.

No error message or anything just straight dump to desktop.

EDIT 2: Verified my files and it found 49 files that failed to validate, so I think Steam is being bad...

Please file a bug report, so the devs will see it.
Yay! it finally hit the KSP store!

I've found all the new launch sites on Kerbin as well as the intriguingly titled "Anniversary02", yet there's no sign of Anniversary01 (or 00) on Kerbin (using SCANsat to find them so I can set position cheat my way to each. I actually flew all the way out to one and managed to completely miss it in the dark...

Next up- search each planet and moon for new anomalies!

When SCREENSHOT_SUPERSIZE is set to greater than zero, the game disables the UI when taking screenshots with F1 (then enables back). So screenshots appear without UI.

As far as I understand and as its not mentioned in the changelog, I presume this is a Unity thing.

We need UI in screenshots.

15 minutes ago, RealKerbal3x said:

Did that fix the maneuver planner issues you were having before, or did it just stop the game from crashing?

Not sure, haven't been able to try it enough to know. I tried recreating the same steps and it didn't crash, but the crash may have been random, I didn't try to reproduce it before verifying files.
All in one minute update video:
Where is the new launch site

Pictures?
my computer is trying so hard to download it...
In case anyone wonder: Yes, the Starshot can be used to destroy orbital facilities

... I have to wait until my must-have-mods have updated to 1.12

 

So I hope the guys around Waterfall, Spectra, Eve Redux and Stockalike station parts expansion redux are getting ready to upgrade their masterpieces.... can't really wait... hope the updates come soooooon. 

Edited June 24, 2021 by Rakete

... I have to wait until my must-have-mods have updated to 1.12

 

So I hope the guys around Waterfall, Spectra, Eve Redux and Stockalike station parts expansion redux are getting ready to upgrade their masterpieces.... can't really wait... hope the updates come soooooon. 

eh, i just wait for a mod to break before i update it

well i guess that wont happen anymore

25 minutes ago, The Doodling Astronaut said:

All in one minute update video:

 

 

oh yeah the ground anchor isnt gonna be added until 1.12.1 cuz they werent ready to release it, more info at the bottom of the OP

2 minutes ago, Souptime said:

oh yeah the ground anchor isnt gonna be added until 1.12.1 cuz they werent ready to release it, more info at the bottom of the OP

Found out, thanks for telling me

1 minute ago, Souptime said:

eh, i just wait for a mod to break before i update it

well i guess that wont happen anymore

We are now at the point where when we talk about stuff that happens when we update the game, it is irrelavant(I think I spelled that wrong).
Brings a tear to my eye....thanks Squad for all the effort you all have put in over the years!!!!
Was going to get BDA, but now I don’t have to thanks to fireworks

28 minutes ago, Rakete said:

Pictures?

I won't spoil it by giving away the locations (yet...) but here are the new launch sites and the new Kerbin anomaly:

Furthest south:

Nearest the KSC:

Furthest north:

And hidden in a mountain valley near the Badlands:

I'm off to find every anomaly in the game, hopefully with some new ones thrown in! The crashed Sputnik is called "Anniversary02" so I need to find out where the others are.

Kerbal Space Program 1.12, for eternity!

Thanks @SQUAD

3 hours ago, UomoCapra said:

* Implement cheats - Ignore Kerbal EVA Construction Mass Limit, Ignore Kerbal Inventory Volume/Mass Limit and Fix repairable parts.

Good for when I’m on Eve and trying to move stuff in my cheats save
Firework propulsion is DEFINITELY possible...now to see how far we can go!
